user_profile: User 1004 is an extroverted and agreeable male in his early 20s with a college education and an upper socioeconomic status. He enjoys a vibrant social life, frequently dining out at fast-casual restaurants like In-N-Out Burger and attending craft breweries. Dancefloors and scenic lookouts are among his favorite hangout spots, as he appreciates both nightlife and nature. He frequently visits cultural locations such as museums and convention centers, demonstrating a keen interest in art and community events. User 1004 is often on the move, indicating a love for travel, reflected in his regular airport check-ins. His exploration of Whole Foods signifies an interest in quality food and groceries. With a mixture of responsibility and spontaneity, he balances routine visits to social venues with excursions to scenic sites, making him open to new experiences. Anticipated future locations include more restaurants and cultural hotspots, reflecting his interests in dining and exploration.
